overview: In an alternate Japan, territorial street gangs form opposing factions collectively known as the Tokyo Tribes. The simmering tension between them is about to boil over into all-out war.
original_title: トウキョウ トライブ
tagline: Let Sion Sono take you on a tour of Tokyo's underbelly for a night of turf wars & rap battles.
cast: Ryohei Suzuki|Young Dais|Nana Seino|Ryuta Sato|Shota Sometani
